snippet.title: Strawberry's Flowers Game Trailer! | Bloomzeye
snippet.description:
My latest pixel art game is ready to play on itch io! Strawberry's Flowers started as a quick sketch that I was happy to turn into a finished game and prototype! 🍓🌸🐄

Here's the itch io gamepage link: https://bloomzeye.itch.io/strawberrys-flowers, and thank you all who've supported me and who listened to my rambles! 

This is actually the first game trailer I've done a voice over for so *throws confetti*

----------------------------------------------

✿ Wanna watch my videos early? My Buy Me a Coffee members who support me monthly gain early access content, game demos, videos, polls, and more! I call it my "Creative Circle": https://bit.ly/bloomzeyebmc 

✿ Find me on the interwebs: https://bit.ly/links-bloomzeye. I'm pretty much Bloomzeye everywhere, Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, etc!

----------------------------------------------
* Music credit: CheckPoint Charlie Song: Joyful Journey - https://checkpoint-charlie.itch.io/adventure-music-pack
* The game engine I use to make my colorful games in: @GDevelopApp 

#pixelart #cozygames #aseprite #gdevelop
